alert.note: Alert for Penobscot (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 02 at 3:15PM EDT until June 02 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: The National Weather Service in Caribou Maine has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Penobscot County in east central Maine... * Until 400 PM EDT. * At 315 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles southwest of Hermon, or 10 miles southeast of Newport, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Newport, Hampden, Hermon, Carmel, Newburgh, Plymouth, Etna and Dixmont. This includes the following highways... Interstate 95 between mile markers 163 and 175. State Highway 9 between Dixmont and Newburgh. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
